dcterms:creator: Y. G. Jiang
J. Liu
A. Roshan Zamir
G. Toderici
I. Laptev
M. Shah
R. Sukthankar
dcterms:description: THUMOS-14 is a dataset initially publicized for a competition for offline action detection and localization, collecting videos from YouTube. It consists of 20 action classes related to sports, with a training set of well-trimmed videos and a validation set used for training and a test set for evaluation.
dcterms:title: THUMOS-14

dcterms:creator: R. De Geest
E. Gavves
A. Ghodrati
Z. Li
C. Snoek
T. Tuytelaars
dcterms:description: TVSeries is a realistic dataset consisting of 27 episodes from six famous TV series, with each video containing a single episode of approximately 20 to 40 minutes. It includes 6,231 action instances over 30 classes, showcasing actions with large variability.
dcterms:title: TVSeries
